description: This file defines a React component 'ScheduleTabs' with a subcomponent 'ManageAvailability'. It provides a UI for managing scheduling tabs, including day-based availability and ICU scheduling. The file contains hooks, event handlers, and imports external components and services, indicating it is a source code file.

methods.name: saveAvailability
methods.description: Handles form submission to save availability data, constructing payload and providing user feedback.
